title.rendered: Eggciting Easter Weekend at the Esplanade

content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_empty_space][vc_column_text]

Toast to spring and explore Zagreb during the Easter weekend! (ovo može u naslovnu fotku ova rečenica)

This spring, take your family on an Easter weekend trip to Zagreb. Explore the many attractions and sights of the city, stroll through the beautiful green parks, meet new people, indulge in the Easter tradition, and experience the amazing feeling of spring in the air.

 

The overnight package includes:

• Two night stay for two in Superior Room (30 March – 1 April 2024)

• Early check-in / late check-out

• Free parking

• Welcome in-room treatment with fine handmade chocolate pralines and a house wine

• À la carte and buffet breakfast served at the Zinfandel’s restaurant or in the privacy of your room

• Two cocktails at your choice at the Esplanade 1925 Lounge & Cocktail Bar

• Free superfast wireless internet access

• Access to Health Club – with fitness centre and sauna free of charge

 

Package price is 410 €[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space]

[vc_column_text]

Please note:
  • The offer is subject to capacity availability on 30 March – 1 April 2024
  • At an additional charge, it is possible to add a guest and to upgrade your room category.
  • VAT is included in the price of the package.
  • The price of the package is for two people in the Superior Room
  • Tourist tax in the amount of €1.59 per person per day is not included in the price.
  • All other services that are not listed in the package are subject to additional charges and can be ordered in advance when booking the package.
Round off your stay at the Esplanade

(all additional services are charged according to the valid price list or menu):

  • Easter Family Lunch at Zinfandel’s with a glass of bubbly, a selection of traditional meals and sweets, piano music and entertainment for kids with an egg hunt! Table reservation is required. Capacity is limited.
  • Facial and body massages and treatments are available at the Health Club Esplanade – prior appointment is required, treatments are charged according to the displayed price list.
  • Limousine transfers – price available on request.
  • Orient Express Afternoon tea for two at the Esplanade bar, selection of teas, snacks, and desserts on a tiered stand, 40 €. Prior table reservation required.
  • Lunch or dinner at Zinfandel’s restaurant or at Le Bistro – à la carte offer, prior table reservation required.
  • Menu du Jour at Le Bistro –  3-course set menu with a glass of house wine, coffee or tea at just 34 €, prior table reservation required.
  • Esplanade štrukli – signature hotel dish at Le Bistro, portion is just 11.5 €. Prior table reservation required.

Package reservations and additional information:

Phone: +385 (0)1 4566 666

reservations@esplanade.hr

 

Published: 8.3.2024[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

excerpt.rendered: Easter brunch is served on Easter Sunday, 31 March 2024, from 12:30 to 16:00 at Zinfandel’s restaurant. Number of guests is limited, which is why we recommended booking a table in advance.
